products.name: Faux Suede Mini Skirt
products.text: A faux suede mini skirt featuring exposed button-front closures and panel seam construction.

products.name: Ruched Rose Print Mini Skirt
products.text: A satin mini skirt featuring an allover floral print, ruched side with self-tie closure, concealed back zipper, and a flounce hem.
